response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which holds immense value and potential for those seeking innovation and excellence. Our product has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its unique features and capabilities, it is valued at $1,200,000 by our company. We believe that this exceptional piece could significantly benefit you, enhancing your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its unparalleled benefits, we kindly invite you to consider our offer. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
